news.headline: Trump trumpety trump
news.body: Trump went to Chicago and all he came back with was hypocritically sweaty news footage.
news.author: Jeremy Paxman

news.headline: People died, we watched Trump.
news.body: People died, we watched Trump. Shame. Shame.
news.author: Kate Adie

news.headline: Global warming a lie, or not.
news.body: It really doesn't matter if you believe or not, we live to excess. Shame. Shame.
news.author: Kate Adie
